name: Block Quazzle Class
description:
Block Quazzle Class is a classic puzzle game for all ages. Once you play it, you'll be hooked believe that.Your goal is so simple, don't let the block building to go up. You can break it down with a suitable block placing. This is the game you played in your childhood with some addictive and amazing attributes addition. Hope you love it.
Features:
Easy to learn, hard to master.
Nice HD graphic, fun & very addicted
Impossible challenges
Brainless control
Amazing Game-Play
